Method Detail

createTable

public UpdateOperation createTable(String tableName,
                                   Class<?> entityClass)
Description copied from interface: SchemaOperations
Create a table with the name given and fields corresponding to the given class. If the table already exists and parameter ifNotExists is true, this is a no-op and false is returned. If the table doesn't exist, parameter ifNotExists is ignored, the table is created and true is returned.

Specified by:
createTable in interface SchemaOperations
entityClass - The class whose fields determine the columns created.

alterTable

public com.google.common.base.Optional<UpdateOperation> alterTable(String tableName,
                                                                   Class<?> entityClass,
                                                                   boolean dropRemovedAttributeColumns)
Description copied from interface: SchemaOperations
Add columns to the given table from the given class. If parameter dropRemovedAttributColumns is true, then this effectively becomes a synchronization operation between the class's fields and the existing table's columns.

Specified by:
alterTable in interface SchemaOperations
entityClass - The class whose fields determine the columns added.
dropRemovedAttributeColumns - Whether to drop columns that exist on the table but that don't have corresponding fields in the class. If true, this effectively becomes a synchronziation operation.

validateTable

public String validateTable(String tableName,
                            Class<?> entityClass)
Description copied from interface: SchemaOperations
Validate columns in the given table from the given class.

Specified by:
validateTable in interface SchemaOperations
entityClass - The class whose fields determine the columns added.
Returns:
Returns alter table statement or null
